title: How to Find Gardening Tools Made in the USA (+ Great American Made Garden Tools!) - AllAmerican.org

tasks.task: Research and recommend American-made gardening tools.
subtasks: Identify materials used in gardening tools (e.g., tempered steel, stainless steel).
Note importance of sourcing raw materials from US suppliers.
Explain how to determine country of origin (e.g., contacting brand, checking labels).
Highlight specific American-made gardening tool brands (e.g., Rogue Hoe Tools, Bully Tools, Wilcox All Pro Tools).
Describe the craftsmanship and features of recommended tools (e.g., durability, environmentally friendly).
Encourage supporting these brands during their slow season for potential discounts.
Urge viewers to visit the brand's website for more information and to contact for country of origin verification.
